subject: p16435402
Findings: Cardiac, mediastinal and hilar contours are unchanged, with the heart size within normal limits. A rounded consolidative opacity within the lingula is mildly smaller compared to the prior study, measuring approximately 57 x 46 cm, previously 62 x 50 cm. No pulmonary vascular congestion is present. There is a small left pleural effusion, slightly increased compared to the prior study. No pneumothorax is identified. Cholecystectomy clips are noted in the right upper quadrant. There are no acute osseous abnormalities.
Impression: Slight interval decrease in size of lingular consolidative opacity with interval increase in size of a small left pleural effusion.
